page.title: 17GRASS MAKING AT WOMERTON
page.content: {Mr.Coleman}has 15 acres of grass and the rest is{bracken}for the sheep to graze on.That is called common land.He grows his own grass because it is much cheaper than buying it from other people. In his{machine yard}are several machines.The first is a{plough}which cuts and turns over the soil.Then he spreads{fertiliser}on the ground.After that he uses the{muck spreader}to help the grass grow.The he{sows}the seeds.When the grass is half grown he runs the{roller}over it.The next stage is cutting the grass.He then lets the grass turn into hay.He turns the hay with a{hay turner}.The last stage is {baling}the hay and taking the bales up into the barn on the{elevator. }
